name: First Class Boulderdash
overview: A homebrew release created with the Amiga version of the Boulderdash Construction Kit and released in Legends Production Pack Volume 1 and in the French Boulderdash Mega-Collectin. It contains twenty caves, with a bonus cave every 5 levels. It begins with a choice of display where one is closer to the original BoulderDash and the other is closer to Emerald Mine. It is related to Royal Boulderdash in construction, difficulty and play.
